bug.author: tlaukkan
bug.summary: UIServer activation graph not visible and model not shown correctly when setting pretrain true
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Issue Description</denchmark-h>
Root cause for this issue seems to be that the network data becomes corrupted due to underflows or overflows. Please describe our issue, along with:
Activation graph should be visible when setting pretrain true Model should show correctly when setting pretrain true. Currently shows only Input -> RBM (layer0)
<denchmark-h:h4>Code</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/tlaukkan/9b137f941cff2a4e879c95f9e1b512db>https://gist.github.com/tlaukkan/9b137f941cff2a4e879c95f9e1b512db</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h4>Version Information</denchmark-h>
Please indicate relevant versions, including, if relevant:
Deeplearning4j 0.7.2, 0.8.0 (status of 0.8.1-SNAPSHOT is unknown) Windows 10 CUDA 8.0
